# Coincise - Crypto API Documentation

> LLM-friendly cryptocurrency exchange API documentation covering 20 exchanges
> with 2,960 endpoint documents optimized for context windows.

This repository provides clean markdown documentation for major crypto exchange APIs.
Documentation is updated weekly and structured for optimal LLM consumption.

## Quick Access

- [Complete Index with Summaries](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/llms-full.txt): All 2,960 documents with summaries
- [JSON Metadata Index](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/api/index.json): Machine-readable documentation index
- [Raw Markdown Files](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/): Direct markdown access

## Exchanges

### Backpack

49 documents | ~41k tokens

**General:**
- [Authentication](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/backpack/authentication.md)
- [Change Log](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/backpack/change_log.md)
- [Error Codes](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/backpack/error_codes.md)
- [Network Connectivity](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/backpack/network_connectivity.md)
- [Rate Limits](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/backpack/rate_limits.md)
- [Response Formats](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/backpack/response_formats.md)

**Endpoints:** 19 public, 24 private

- [Authentication](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/binance/spot/authentication.md)

**Endpoints:** 89 public, 144 private
